question: The Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) has recently discovered the presence of another kind of coronavirus in which species?
explanation:
The researchers from the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) have recently discovered the presence of another kind of coronavirus in two bat species.
The new virus called ‘bat coronavirus (BtCoV)’ is found in two bat species in five states namely Kerala, Himachal Pradesh, Puducherry and Tamil Nadu. Whereas there is no evidence that this virus could cause disease in human beings, as per their study published in the Indian Journal of Medical Research.
